- [ ] ğŸ› Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] âœ¨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] ğŸ’¥ Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality
      to not work as expected)
- [ ] ğŸ”§ Code refactor (no functional changes)
- [ ] ğŸ“š Documentation update

### **Description**

Provide a clear and concise description of the changes made.

### **Related Issues**

Closes # [issue number] Addresses # [issue number]

### **Changes Made**

- **Files Modified:** List key files changed
- **New Dependencies:** Any new dependencies added
- **Database Changes:** Schema changes, migrations, etc.
- **API Changes:** New endpoints, modifications, etc.

### **Testing**

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] E2E tests added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Cross-browser testing (if applicable)
- [ ] Performance testing (if applicable)

### **Security Checklist**

- [ ] Security review completed
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed
- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] Authentication/authorization checked
- [ ] Dependencies scanned for vulnerabilities
- [ ] GDPR compliance verified (if applicable)
- [ ] PCI DSS compliance verified (if applicable)

### **Compliance Checklist**

- [ ] Regulatory requirements met
- [ ] Accessibility standards met
- [ ] Internationalization considered
- [ ] Browser compatibility verified

### **Performance Impact**

- **Before:** [baseline metrics]
- **After:** [new metrics]
- **Impact:** [positive/neutral/negative]

### **Deployment Notes**

- **Database Migrations:** Required? [Yes/No]
- **Environment Variables:** New variables needed?
- **Configuration Changes:** Required?
- **Rollback Plan:** How to rollback if needed?

### **Screenshots/Visual Changes**

If applicable, add screenshots or GIFs showing the changes.

### **Additional Context**

Add any other context about the pull request here.

## ğŸ” Code Review Checklist

### **General**

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] No console.log statements left in production code
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Code is readable and maintainable

### **TypeScript/JavaScript**

- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined
- [ ] No any types without justification
- [ ] Async/await used appropriately
- [ ] Error handling implemented

### **Testing**

- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Edge cases covered
- [ ] Error scenarios tested
- [ ] Performance tests included (if applicable)

### **Security**

- [ ] Input validation implemented
- [ ] SQL injection prevention (if applicable)
- [ ] XSS prevention (if applicable)
- [ ] Authentication/authorization verified

### **Performance**

- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] Bundle size impact assessed
- [ ] Database queries optimized
- [ ] Memory leaks prevented
